item.title: Pope prays at site of 2020 port explosion, consoles relatives of victims
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has concluded his first foreign trip with a farewell speech in Beirut, referencing the ongoing conflict in southern Lebanon

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to host Cabinet meeting at White House on Tuesday
item.description: Trump is also set to make an announcement at 2 p.m. ET, the White House said.

item.title: White House is 'very optimistic' ahead of Russia-US meeting on ending Ukraine war
item.description: Special envoy Witkoff and Jared Kushner is scheduled to meet Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Bear enjoys fresh snowfall at Chicago zoo
item.description: A resident bear at Brookfield Zoo Chicago took delight in the fresh snowfall over the weekend, rolling around in the snow.
